*div1 type="summary"* *p*Trade with Mexico. George Nixon against Austin.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Rio Grande*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-13-1825">13th October 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*D Sir, I have been here a little better then a week, and confind to the *location_mentioned*House */location_mentioned*the greater part of the time, but am recovering very fast, I was taken sick a few days after leaving *location_mentioned*Saint Antonio*/location_mentioned*, and has suffered very much; I expect to leave here in a few days, for *location_mentioned*Sant fernando*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Sant Ross*/location_mentioned*, from what I can learn there are a grate many goods in *location_mentioned*this part of the County*/location_mentioned*—The *person_mentioned*Indians*/person_mentioned* are still doing Mischief in *location_mentioned*this part of the Country*/location_mentioned*, they stole forty Horses from here a few days before we arrived here.— I have heard it said by several persons here and in *location_mentioned*Sant Antonia*/location_mentioned*, that *person_mentioned*Nixon*/person_mentioned* is writing against you, to the Government, and to the principal *person_mentioned*individuals */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*town*/location_mentioned*, and to a number of other *location_mentioned*Towns*/location_mentioned*, and prefering charges against you, to the Government, I understand he said he is going on to *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned* himself, and sais he has the papers, to show what you are, I name this as a friend excuse my bad writing*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Robert Lewis*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*My nearvs are very weeke*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*R L*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
